title: David and Victoria Beckham take daughter Harper for an afternoon of shopping at Saint Laurent store
text:
The Beckhams enjoyed a spot of shopping on Tuesday afternoon in Beverly Hills, as they spend the British half-term week stateside.

David and Victoria were seen heading to the Saint Laurent store with their daughter Harper, who looked to be enjoying luxury store, smiling and dancing around inside.

The eight-year-old wore a pink top, denim shorts and a flip-flops, while her mother, 45, went for an all-black ensemble.

Retail therapy: The Beckhams enjoyed a spot of shopping on Tuesday afternoon in Beverly Hills, as they spend the British half-term week stateside

Save for her luminous yellow trainers, Posh Spice slipped into dark leggings and a top, pulling a cap lowly over her face.

David, 44, wore an Adidas Tee, baggy black shorts, trainers and a baseball cap, which he styled backwards.

The family sauntered around the designer shop before leaving as low-key as the most famous family in the world can.

Victoria was seen getting into the car where she waited for her husband and Harper - the youngest of the four Beckham children - to join her.

High spirits: David and Victoria were seen heading to the Saint Laurent store with their daughter Harper, who looked to be enjoying luxury store, smiling and dancing around inside

Low-key: Victoria was seen getting into the car where she waited for her husband and Harper - the youngest of the four Beckham children - to join her

Fashion first: The eight-year-old wore a pink top, denim shorts and a flip-flops

Shopped til she dropped: The family sauntered around the designer shop before leaving as low-key as the most famous family in the world can

Snapped: Brooklyn, 20, was spotted spending time with a mystery blonde girl at a mansion party in Beverly Hills, LA

While middle sons Romeo, 17, and Cruz, 14, weren't present, Posh and Becks' eldest child, Brooklyn, 20, was spotted out a few nights before, also currently staying in Los Angeles.

He was out with pals - namely a mystery blonde girl, who he seemed close to.

The aspiring photographer dressed down in all-black ensemble while his pretty companion drew attention to herself by wearing an oversized yellow racing jacket, featuring distinctive markings.

The pair appeared to stay close together while the party broke up and their other friends dispersed.

Mystery woman: His pretty companion drew attention to herself by wearing an oversized racing jacket, featuring distinctive markings

Low key: The aspiring photographer dressed down in all-black ensemble

Leggy: Despite her oversized jacket, the platinum beauty put in a leggy appearance, with her attire beneath proving to be extremely short

Current flame? This timing of his LA outing earlier this month crosses over with reports that he is dating brunette actress Phoebe Torrance, 25 (pictured at The Box, London on Tuesday)

Despite her oversized jacket, the platinum beauty put in a leggy appearance, with her attire beneath proving to be extremely short.

Her short locks were styled into a low twist tied at the nape of her neck, with some strands left to effortlessly frame her stunning visage.

She accessorised with gold hoop earrings and enhanced her beauty with a heavy layering of mascara and lipgloss on her full pout.

Brooklyn wrapped up warm for the night-time event, with a thick woolly hat atop his head.

MailOnline has contacted Brooklyn's representatives for comment.
